name: Grapple To Go
description:
This game was created as an assessment for the subject Introduction to Game Design at the University of Technology Sydney (UTS) ( https://www.uts.edu.au/).

This game was designed and developed by:

  • Jaiden Chicote
  • Yunran Nie
  • Kyle Hammer
  • Difei Ma

The game was developed in the Unity Game Engine ( https://unity3d.com/). The game is not a commercial product.

To see more, view the UTS Games Studio YouTube channel or visit http://www.gamesstudio.org/
